website_summaries.verdict: Affordable set that includes accessories seen in premium kits. BPA-free and made with quality food-grade silicone.
pros: Easy to poach eggs to your liking without fear of ruining them and includes instructions on how to cook other popular egg dishes like mini omelets or frittata bites
Manufacturer offers a free e-book chock-full of recipes
cons: Some complaints that results can be hit or miss

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Was glad to receive my package on time and intact as advertised on TV. I had bought an egg cooker which I was not so happy with (it didn’t even come with instructions) not until a friend introduced me to this particular one by EGGY YO egglettes cookers set. Now I don’t have to think about the stress of peeling eggs, most importantly my eggs come out perfectly hard-boiled. I always use the brush that came with them to spread olive oil in the egg containers and then cracked the egg in it, once boiled my eggs comes out freely and easily with no breakage... I’d recommend you try this silicone hard-boiled egg cooker and thank me later!
customer_reviews.author: DDS Supplies

customer_reviews.title: Eggs don't come out perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking it would be a nice way of boiling eggs without peeling the shells off. Well, it does an ok job, but in all the times I've used it, the eggs do not just pop right out without leaving some of the white in the cup. I've super coated the cup in oil until the egg itself is oily, and still, they don't just pop out. I'll keep it cause I don't care what my eggs look like cause I just like eating hard boiled eggs, but I'm not super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brand

customer_reviews.title: Ok but returning
customer_reviews.text: This didn't turn out to be the time saver I had hoped. I had to use a larger pot than I wanted due to the size of the silicone egg holder. I can say the eggs cooked evenly. They didn't pop out too easily either, but came out easily with a spoon. I am returning this just because it's not a quicker solution for my needs .
customer_reviews.author: A. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool for eggs. I was so tired of fighting with simple stuff like peeling eggs that I would do dopey things like buying a carton of fresh eggs and buying already peeled ones at the same time. I gave this a try and this just makes sense. I have not tried adding stuff to the eggs before boiling but in time I will.
customer_reviews.author: Rowekx

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It’s not that convenient to use plus I have tried 3 times now to get good looking boiled eggs and each time they come out looking like the ones in the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Glen Davis _

customer_reviews.title: TRASH
customer_reviews.text: I am a trained chef with over 30 years residence in the US, Austria, Germany, Italy, and France. I bought this as an experiment for several recipies. —— 1) eggs stick (I used various types/combinations of oils) ——2) yokes float to the top, so useless for hardboiled eggs. ——— 3) caps leak. —— THIS PRODUCT IS GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.author: MusicMaker

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this at all. Because they float the eggs didn’t cook well, they were very hard to get completely clean, and very hard to get the egg out intact. I got this cause I thought it was supposed to be easier then peeling the shell off a hard boiled egg, but it was really so much harder and so much more work
customer_reviews.author: leslie lachenauer

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled!
customer_reviews.text: I tried my product for the first time. Followed the directions perfectly for hard boiled eggs. Cooked them the time specified, and then placed them in cool water. Even though I had prepared the cups with olive oil (called for a drop per cup) I used the brush which used much more than one drop, the eggs did not fully cook and they stuck to the cups. Wasted six eggs! Don't waste your money on this product!
customer_reviews.author: WineCountryGal

customer_reviews.title: Quick hard-boiled eggs
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These are fun to use, especially for egg salad. Only negative is that the yolk floats so not enough coverage with white for balanced Deviled Eggs! I thought I'd try filling them with smoothies and freezing them for popsicles. I can't see a reason that would not work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: This product is a total rip off. I followed all directions to simply make a hard boiled egg and after multiple attempts I got the same terrible outcome every time. Even after oiling the insides of the cups as directed, the egg whites stuck to the inside of the cups. When trying to remove the egg from the cup, only the yolk popped out from the hard boiled egg. To make matters worse.. cleaning was a nightmare because the egg whites were completely stuck to the inside of the cups. Do yourself a favor and keep your money! In the process of trying to return.
customer_reviews.author: brittany price

customer_reviews.title: Great way to hard boil eggs!
customer_reviews.text: I have always struggled with peeling hard boiled eggs, so bought this product to avoid the hassle. It was really easy to use and the eggs turned out great! The package even included an egg timer (no batteries needed) which I did not realize came with it when I purchased the product. Looking forward to using it again, very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Alyson

customer_reviews.title: eggette
customer_reviews.text: I followed instructions and they still did not come out easy=stuck. They took as long as the old fashioned way if not longer and I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so cool
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but I'll stick to just cooking eggs, it's a pain to get out but it does make great pop cycles
customer_reviews.author: Morinanna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as well as i hoped
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work as well as i hoped. when compared to other versions with plastic cups, this is better, but still not great. even using oil, the egg sticks some and it is a pain to clean!
customer_reviews.author: RRocket204

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife....happy life....
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these egglettes for my wife to help solve her problem of making hard-boiled eggs. She used them to try some hard-boiled eggs and was amazed at how seamless it was. All she did was gone through the cooking manual for the egg cooker set and it worked like magic, the eggs were cooked effortlessly! No shell peeling, Overall, pleased with my purchase and can’t wait to tell my friends and relatives about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jcanata

customer_reviews.title: Good cookers
customer_reviews.text: These egg cookers work well. You have to play with the timing of cooking the eggs. Too long n the eggs are too hard n rubbery. I love that I don't have to peel my hard boiled eggs anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Diva

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom so she wouldn't have to peel eggs anymore... she loves it...
customer_reviews.author: Sharlene H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This egg cooker is VERY easy to use and clean. With a bit of oil, the finished eggs slide right out. The included instructions are easy to follow as well. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Harris

customer_reviews.title: Hardboiled
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! Between me eating hardboiled eggs for breakfast and my wife making egg salad and deviled eggs for parties, these do the job right
customer_reviews.author: great game

customer_reviews.title: No Mess or peeling
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I do eggs allot and now it's no mess. Even comes with a timer 👍🏼 Make sure you use a spray first like Pam.
customer_reviews.author: TODD

customer_reviews.title: I need another one.
customer_reviews.text: My sister grabbed this from its cubby so I never had the cbance to use!
customer_reviews.author: Theone Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Taste like a fried egg
customer_reviews.text: It says to oil it which makes it taste more like a fried egg than a boiled egg. It is a process to get them all set up and screwed on.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible but Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: The time it takes to clean each unit, assemble and prepare you may as well just peel the egg shells. Didn’t cook through after trying 3xs as long as recommended I ended up with pretty much soft boiled eggs. Clean up is a pain in the ass even when using oil.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Francis

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a great idea but it doesn’t work well at all. The oil sticks to the eggs and leaves them nasty looking. They don’t slide out of the silicone without cutting them loose. The worst part is the cleaning. The egg sticks to the silicone and is a job to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Danny W

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to use. Don’t work right. Hard to clean after using.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Evans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hard boiled eggs! Don’t buy anything else
customer_reviews.text: SUPER worth it!! Love the EGGY YO to make my hard boiled eggs. No more peeling eggs and struggling. Super easy to use and makes perfect eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Young

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. This is now the only way I cook hard boiled eggs. No more taking off the shells! Easy to use and easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H

customer_reviews.title: What a joke
customer_reviews.text: We returned this product. We followed the directions, the eggs stuck, then to clean the cups difficult, We had to purchase a bottle brush to get them clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I use it daily with a little cooking spray on the inside, it never sticks. Easiest product on the market
customer_reviews.author: Barbara k

customer_reviews.title: Its a wonderful product !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly father, he uses them all the time. It's simple, straight forward & He likes how convenient they are, & they work great for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with product
customer_reviews.text: I followed all the directions and the eggs were runny and yucky. I coated the inside of the eggs with olive oil and I had a very hard time removing the egg. I thought maybe I did something wrong so I tried to cook them again and had the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Oertle

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, sometime eggs stick but it got better whe i switched from rhe brush to cooking spray.
customer_reviews.author: Don Althoff

customer_reviews.title: No more trying to peel eggs
customer_reviews.text: I love these... don't have to peel the hard boiled eggs anymore and eat shells in egg salads. Easy to boil and clean up. Also the eggs stand up no rolling around.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Hutch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I make soft boiled eggs for breakfast. Hated to crack the shells to get the egg out while trying to keep the egg hot Love how the egg just slides out of the container and is ready to eat. Simple clean up
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ganey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this product so nice and easy to use very convenient
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Theys

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver - Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This product helps you boil eggs much easier than having to peel them all the time. Saves time and the eggs come out great!
customer_reviews.author: A. D.

customer_reviews.title: Crack, Pour, Boil, Eat
customer_reviews.text: I am the worst at peeling eggs, so this is just what I needed. I look forward to making mini-omelets.
customer_reviews.author: TLS

customer_reviews.title: Egg not
customer_reviews.text: It took a lot longer to set up a use than to just boil the eggs in water.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Covered all cups with oil and every single egg stuck in its cup
customer_reviews.author: Darrin

customer_reviews.title: Packs well for lunches or snacks.
customer_reviews.text: As long as you use canola oil, this is the fastest way to have a peeled hard boiled egg. Easy clean up too, doesn’t really have any “egg” smell when you open it either.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R.

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to a T. Every time the egg stuck to the cup, Yolks floated to the top and did not cook evenly. Save your money. I wish I could get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie H.

customer_reviews.title: coat with a good amount of oil
customer_reviews.text: love it just make sure you coat the inside with a good amount of oil or they will stick. :)
customer_reviews.author: Karla Walters

customer_reviews.title: Worked like it was suppose to!
customer_reviews.text: A lot to wash! But nice not to peel the eggs ! A trade off😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I only received three caps for my 6 piece set.... that’s a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Reger

customer_reviews.title: Not working as promoted
customer_reviews.text: All eggs have stuck to sides of rubber containers and was trying to send it back when you didn’t allow the return
customer_reviews.author: Dr Life

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I found the product easy to use and provided a great way to not have to deal with egg shells. I also like the ability of being able to add different things to the eggs to create different meals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more peeling eggs!
customer_reviews.text: Can boil 6 at a time and don't have to struggle to peel egg
customer_reviews.author: beverly oden

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: your better off just peeling them! cleaning it was a nightmare, the egg gets stuck.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: TOP SIDE OF THE EGG IS FLAT - AESTHETICALLY NOT VERY ATTRACTIVE  !!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY CONVENIENT IF YOU HAVE DAY FRESH EGGS WHICH OFTEN CAN BE DIFFICULT TO PEEL.
customer_reviews.author: W.N.

customer_reviews.title: These egg cookers allowed me to create something that blows away those Starbucks souve eggs
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of those Starbucks souve eggs, but I was trying to figure out a more economic and healthier way to prepare something similar at home. This set of egg cookers was the answer to my search. I discovered the instructions are fun and easy to follow. I was able to add my own veggies, meat and spices to these egg cookers that allowed me to create something that blows away those Starbucks souve eggs. When I was finished cooking my eggs, I threw these bad boys in the dishwasher and they cleaned up very well. They are simple to hand wash as well.
customer_reviews.author: JonSam

customer_reviews.title: My husband likes it.
customer_reviews.text: When we received it, it had a missing top to one of the egg holders. My husband likes boiled eggs, but doesn't like to peel them. Since the eggs you buy at the store are from chickens that are not fed enough of the right vitamin so the shells come off easier. (My sister raised chickens that is why I have this useless info. Her eggs peeled perfect & easily!) We experimented with the silicone brush and oil, not so good, we are going to try spray oil (similar to Pam Spray) and see if that works better.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Not At All Like The Ad
customer_reviews.text: Not at all like the ad. They are okay if you want to use them in a salad or add to Tuan/chicken salad, but not presentable as a deviled egg or to stick I a lunchbox. They stick to the inside and don’t just “pop” out.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: worked great, I see negitive reviews on this product, my advice is, like said in instructions, USE VEGI OIL , my suggestion is , use a spray, dont use the brush. my eggs came out great,, people whining about the eggs coming out looking hot perfect? really? are you placing them on display? or you going to eat them??
customer_reviews.author: mitch

customer_reviews.title: Still trying to get it right
customer_reviews.text: I found that there was always a bit of egg white that never seems to turn solid on each egg. The egg cup floats at the level of egg white. I might try to add extra egg white to fill the cup to the lid. I like the fact each egg is exactly the same shape as the next. Having fun playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Mannon

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Best ever! So easy! Man it really helps cut out the frusteration of peeling eggs. Thats the worst thing in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Niki D

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: While I like the idea of not having to Shell the boiled eggs, they did not pop out as advertised. The cops are also not easy to clean and tend not to stay in holder frame.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Painter

customer_reviews.title: Great product low cost.
customer_reviews.text: Straight forward and easy to use. Came with more than expected.
customer_reviews.author: David L. McCartney

customer_reviews.title: Solid materials
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used so I’ll have to update my review after use. It was delivered on time and the materials seem solid. Will let you know how my eggs turn out
customer_reviews.author: Qui

customer_reviews.title: It's an okay little product.
customer_reviews.text: Product works okay I found cook times needed to be a little longer than stated in the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Terrible results !!️
customer_reviews.text: I used these exactly as instructed-results nothing like pictures. Also very complicated to use, I will gladly go back to peeling my eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi F.

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the process to make hard boiled eggs especially peeling the shell off wich makes a mess and isn’t really worth the trouble. I looked around on eBay and Amazon and found the EGGY YO hard boiled egg maker and decided to give it a try maybe it could be my savior! I have used them now 3 times and they work like magic honestly! Just read threw the instructions that come with it and you will be amazed with the results
customer_reviews.author: Tony cosentino

product_meta.title: EGGY YO Hard Boiled Egg Maker: 5 in 1 Egg Cooker Set with 6 Silicone Cups, Holder, Brush, White Separator, Timer - Make Hard Boiled Eggs Without the Shell - As Seen on TV Egg Boiler
product_meta.description:
EGGY YO SET CONTENT 
6x Silicone Egg Cup 
1x Oil Brush 
1x Cups Holder 
1x White Separator 
1x Timer 
+ Protective Box and Instructions Manual 
+ FREE ebook with Recipes 
+ 90-Day Satisfaction GUARANTEE 

HANDY EGG MAKER 
EGGY YO convenient Egg Cooker Set makes cooking eggs so simple. It is The Original Egg Set that allows you to make hard, medium or soft boiled eggs. 

EASY TO USE 
Make cooking eggs as easy as Crack, Boil and Pop. Use the brush to lightly coat the inside of Egg Cup with oil before gently cracking eggs into them and securing the lids to the cups. Next, place the Cups in the Egg Holder and boil in water until cooked to desired style. Carefully remove Holder from hot water and place the Cups in cold water before popping cooked eggs out. 

NO SHELL PEELING 
With our instant Egg Steamer Set, you won’t have to spend precious time peeling eggs. It is thermodynamically designed to cook eggs exactly as if they were in a shell, so you get cooked eggs without difficult peeling later. 

MULTIPLE USES 
Use the Set to cook eggs or easily make Egg Bites or mini Omelet by adding Veggies, cooked Meat and Cheese before eggs are placed in the pot to boil. We’ve also included a Bonus ebook that features Recipes and Instructions to help you make delicious Egg Dishes. 

NO BPA 
Our Egg Cooker is made from Food Safe and Non Toxic materials that contain no BPA. It’s Top Rack Dishwasher safe. New design includes only one vent hole to prevent water from getting in and improved safety threads to keep lids on during boiling. 

ADD TO CART NOW - you’ll fall in love instantly with this Egg Set!
feature_bullets: HANDY EGG POACHER: this set makes the cooking of hard, medium or soft boiled eggs so simple
EASY TO USE: brush poached egg cups with oil, crack eggs into them, place cups in holder and boil
NO SHELL PEELING: with EY boil egg set you'll never have to struggle to peel hard-boiled egg again
MULTIPLE USES: cook delicious healthy egg dishes, make the best egg bites or mini omelets with ease
SAFE PURCHASE: as seen on TV egg cookers EGGY YO are food safe products with no BPA
